name: Den Of Thieves & Special Delivery
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per turn, if Skyhook Platform on table and opponent just forfeited a character present with your slaver, may ''enslave'' that character (stack character face down under Skyhook Platform). May place an ''enslaved'' character in owner''s Lost Pile to activate up to 3 Force. Once per turn, while Indentured To The Empire on table, may cancel a Force drain by placing here from hand any non-unique slaver. Slavers may deploy from here as if from hand. May not be canceled. (Immune to Alter.)',
